product_name: CamelBak Cloud Walker Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: The CamelBak Cloud Walker Hydration Pack is perfect for short outings and day hikes. It offers storage for your gear and water for your body! 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a welded center baffle and low-profile shape for stability. Hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back to leave more room for layers and gear. Wide-mouth port cuts weight and makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Folding arms lock into position to hold the reservoir open when drying; arms tuck out of the way around the port when not in use. Reservoir is taste free, easy to clean and easy to fill via its large, 3.5-in. opening. Harness and air-channel back panel offer stability, ventilation and comfort. Main compartment holds gear while the outside zippered pocket keeps small essentials close at hand. The CamelBak Cloud Walker Hydration Pack features 2 compression straps help stabilize the load.
short_description: The CamelBak Cloud Walker Hydration Pack is perfect for short outings and day hikes. It offers storage for your gear and water for your body!
